stages.name: Model Lifecycle Management and Compliance
stages.description: Model lifecycle management becomes a focus from a compliance perspective. Approval, version control, change records, and impact assessment need to be fully documented. When model outputs are used for critical business decisions, human-machine collaboration mechanisms and threshold alerts should be established.
